basic_info.name: YMCA Institute for Media Studies and Information Technology FAQs

faqs.question: How are the facilities of the YMCA Institute for Media Studies and Information Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.IMSIT has Computer Lab, Editing Lab, Photo - Video Studio and Audio Studio. The students are given hands-on training to produce documentaries, Ads, News stories, Short films, Radio Programs and Lab journals. YMCA has one of the best libraries in Delhi. The students of Media studies do live projects, news programs, discussions, etc. The institute also has in-house studios, cameras, editing bays, computers and other state-of-the-art equipment.

YMCA Institute for Media Studies and Information Technology (IMSIT), New Delhi is a well-known name for studying media and information technology for many years. The new courses were introduced for the students keeping in mind the future technology and skill development. IMSIT runs over 20 courses related to Media Studies and Information Technology. The institute offers degree and short term courses in the discipline of New Media, Television Production & Journalism, TV News Reading, Photography and many more.
